title: Transatlantic Choices: Cooperation or Conflict?
description:
The CSIS Scholl Chair is honored to be hosting Dr. Sabine Weyand, the new Director General of Trade for the European Commission on her first official trip to Washington, DC in her new role. The trading relationship between the United States and the European Union forms a key part of the backbone of the transatlantic alliance. Join us as we discuss with Dr. Weyand this relationship, her vision of trade in the 21st century, and the role of the U.S. and the EU in constructing and maintaining a multilateral global trading system. 

This event is made possible by general support to CSIS.
itunes:author: William Alan Reinsch
